attributes.action: Allow Jewellery & Watches retail shops to reopen.
attributes.additional_details: Owners, employees and the customers of the Jewellery and watches shops are not at higher risk of covid-19 infection then food industry retails and markets. Therefore there is no reason why they could not be reopened. Jewellery industry, both production and retail is a very volatile business and any major disruption on the market can potential put handstands of people at risk of loosing their jobs.
attributes.background: Give the permission to reopen Jewellery and Watches retail shops.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Government has announced that non-essential shops can expect to reopen on 15 June 2020.
